sentences.sentence: The man who murdered the girl is no son of mine. I disown him.
sentences.translation: 谋杀那个女孩的人不配做我的儿子，我和他脱离关系。

sentences.sentence: The cluster node showing this log entry will disown the floating resource.
sentences.translation: 显示此日志条目的集群节点认为自己不具有浮动资源。

sentences.sentence: But Peter declared, "Even if I have to die with you, I will never disown you."
sentences.translation: 彼得说，我就是必须和你同死，也总不能不认你。
